titles.title: PIONEER Act
PIONEER Act
Promoting Innovation and Offering the Needed Escape from Exhaustive Regulations Act
A bill to establish a regulatory sandbox program under which agencies may provide waivers of agency rules and guidance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Promoting Innovation and Offering the Needed Escape from Exhaustive Regulations Act or the PIONEER Act
This bill establishes a federal regulatory sandbox program to allow businesses to apply for a temporary waiver from a federal regulation, guidance document, or any other document issued by an agency.
The bill establishes the Office of Federal Regulatory Relief to administer the program.
